meanings.definition: A synthetic form of prostaglandin used to treat erectile dysfunction.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed alprostadils to help with his condition.
meanings.sent2: Many patients find relief with alprostadils for their health issues.
meanings.sent3: When the man took alprostadils, he suddenly felt like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: The effect of alprostadils was like a magic potion, restoring vitality.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacy stocked up on alprostadils due to high demand.
